channel.title: [PI] Real Soul Split Help
channel.description: im using PI Hybrid Pvp v3, the current soul split actually heals only 2 health per hit. how do i change it so instead of being a constant 2 hp per hit i need to change it to a 1/4 damage dealt including the prayer drain like real soul split in runescape?
